categories: Category:Star Wars: The Bad Batch soundtracks

nodes.text: Star Wars: The Bad Batch, Volume 1 (Episodes 1-8)

Star Wars: The Bad Batch, Volume 1 (Episodes 1-8) is a soundtrack featuring music composed by Kevin Kiner for the first eight episodes of the first season of Star Wars: The Bad Batch. It was released digitally on June 25, 2021.
